alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brevard County through 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kennedy Space Center, or 8 miles south of Playalinda Beach, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Cocoa, Cape Canaveral, Port Saint John and Mims. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
